```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r EDA1}
phanalytix %>% 
    group_by(date, ratings) %>% 
    summarise(debuts = sum(debut_dummy)) %>% 
    arrange(desc(debuts)) %>% 
    ggplot() +
    geom_smooth(aes(x = debuts, y = ratings)) +
    geom_jitter(aes(x = debuts, y = ratings))
```

```{r EDA2}
phanalytix %>% 
    group_by(date, ratings) %>% 
    summarise(notes = sum(notes_dummy)) %>% 
    arrange(desc(notes)) %>% 
    ggplot() +
    geom_jitter(aes(notes, ratings)) +
    geom_smooth(aes(notes, ratings))
```

```{r EDA3}
phanalytix %>% 
    group_by(date, ratings) %>% 
    summarise(avgGap = mean(gap)) %>% 
    arrange(desc(avgGap)) %>% 
    ggplot() +
    geom_jitter(aes(avgGap, ratings)) +
    geom_smooth(aes(avgGap, ratings))

```
